mapper.insert: insert into customer (CustomerId, FirstName, LastName, Company, Address, City, State, Country, PostalCode, Phone, Fax, Email, SupportRepld) values (#{customerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportrepld,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update customer set FirstName = #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LastName = #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, City = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, State = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PostalCode = #{postalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SupportRepld = #{supportrepld,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CustomerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CustomerId, FirstName, LastName, Company, Address, City, State, Country, PostalCode, Phone, Fax, Email, SupportRepld from customer where CustomerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select CustomerId, FirstName, LastName, Company, Address, City, State, Country, PostalCode, Phone, Fax, Email, SupportRepld from customer
